data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=jLgPnwVzcj0Q7kNvgHomwIQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB-PhS0pYTnBRkHarYjNDVWk0TbdQ9rTeIko8gMZQBcPQ&oe=667FEE37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EwQjRtvBVYMQ7kNvgHSAvtD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB9BiueYv4hMvpVAjEOiXSepCuAe6o3vj5LI7rGtVQ6Gg&oe=667FFBD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GtP5Iwlu73cQ7kNvgFwptco&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCPVSrHJv1lAj2ysK9d0cRogZlzrlfFLCB--u5n1nr-Eg&oe=667FE709)
